hanzi-su-wiki:
胸

Значения

Грудь, душа

Мнемоника

Справа — согнувшийся человек 勹 со злом 凶 в груди. Часть тела 月, где таится зло — грудь.

Варианты

胷

purpleculture_examples:
胸脯 [ xiōng pú ]: chest
胸怀 [ xiōng huái ]: one's bosom (the seat of emotions); breast; broad-minded and open; to think about; to cherish
胸口 [ xiōng kǒu ]: pit of the stomach
胸膛 [ xiōng táng ]: chest
胸部 [ xiōng bù ]: chest; bosom

heisig_chinese_memo: Bosom is a flesh part that should be bound up lest it provoke villainous thoughts from cruel people.
heisig_constituent: bosom, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, bound up, villain, sheaf, shovel
heisig_story: Part of the body . . . bound up . . . villain.
koohiiStory1: Just think of the heroine's bosom in a movie. The villain ties up the heroine (to the traintracks or the conveyor belt etc) but her bosom is the body part that is always left sticking out.
koohiiStory2: As you know, female comics villains are always binding the flesh of their bosom up in interesting ways. One has to wonder how these clothes stay on their body at all...
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In a prison on the moon lies a treasure chest containing a golden chest piece. This mighty chest armor will grant you protection from nearly any attack, for it is imbued with moon magic.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine finding this treasure chest and donning the mighty chest armor. Feel the weight of the golden chest piece and the vast protection it grants you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Where is this chest armor from? It’s from the moon. Now how would you say that if you were Canadian? It’s from the moon, eh (むね). Right, this here chest armor is from the moon, eh.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Try and remember this kanji and its reading and meaning with a Canadian accent and you’ll have no problem remembering how to read it, eh.
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), ノ, 凵 (открытая коробка), 勹 (обёртка), 月 (месяц)
Ru_trainchinese: xiōng: (сущ) грудь, грудная клетка; ум, сердце
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the body part (⺼) a villain (凶) keeps wrapped up (勹) is the chest
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Bosom is a flesh part that should be bound up lest it provoke villainous thoughts from cruel people.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " moon ", " Hungarian " sound, the original meaning is between the neck and abdomen, part of the trunk. "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji‧ Ziren": "Those who scream with their chest." Tang Wen Tingyun (Nan Gezi): "Golden parrot in hand, phoenix embroidered on the chest."

" Chest " can also mean the heart. The second part of Jin Luji's "Going to Luo": "What is sorrow and desire, lingering and confusing." The idioms "no city in the chest" and "no big ambition in the chest" also use this meaning.

" Hawk " is the same as " chest ", which means a part of the torso. "Vocabulary ‧ meat department": "Chest and the same chest." "Twenty years of public Zuo Xi ‧": "Wei Chou, Chest injury to the (chest), public Yusha, and love their material" " , Chest " The front can also be expressed in the literature. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng"Nandu Fu": "After Tang Guyong, Luoshui swayed his belly (chest)." Liu Liang's note: "The belly is the front."
humanum_short_description_en: From " moon ", " Hungarian " sound, the original meaning is between the neck and abdomen, part of the trunk.
humanum_full_description:
從「月」，「匈」聲，本義為頸、腹之間，軀幹的一部分。《周禮‧考工記‧梓人》：「以胸鳴者。」唐溫庭筠〈南歌子〉：「手裏金鸚鵡，胸前繡鳳凰。」

　　「胸」也可表示心中。晉陸機〈赴洛〉之二：「憂苦欲何為，纏綿胸與臆。」成語「胸無城府」、「胸無大志」也用此義。

　　「胷」同於「胸」，表示軀幹的一部分。《字彙‧肉部》：「胷，同胸。」《左傳‧僖公二十八年》：「魏犨傷於胷（胸），公欲殺之，而愛其材。」 「胷」在文獻中也能表示前面。《文選‧張衡〈南都賦〉》：「湯谷湧其後，淯水盪其胷（胸）。」劉良注：「胷謂前也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「月」，「匈」聲，本義為頸、腹之間，軀幹的一部分。

胸(むね): breast, chest

從「 月 」，「 匈 」聲，本義為頸、腹之間，軀幹的一部分。《周禮‧考工記‧梓人》：「以胸鳴者。」唐溫庭筠〈南歌子〉：「手裏金鸚鵡，胸前繡鳳凰。」 「 胸 」也可表示心中。晉陸機〈赴洛〉之二：「憂苦欲何為，纏綿胸與臆。」成語「胸無城府」、「胸無大志」也用此義。 「 胷 」同於「 胸 」，表示軀幹的一部分。《字彙‧肉部》：「胷，同胸。」《左傳‧僖公二十八年》：「魏犨傷於胷（胸），公欲殺之，而愛其材。」 「 胷 」在文獻中也能表示前面。《文選‧張衡〈南都賦〉》：「湯谷湧其後，淯水盪其胷（胸）。」劉良注：「胷謂前也。」
From " moon", " Hungarian" sound, the original meaning is between the neck and abdomen, part of the trunk. "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji‧ Ziren": "Those who scream with their chest." Tang Wen Tingyun (Nan Gezi): "Golden parrot in hand, phoenix embroidered on the chest." " Chest" can also mean the heart. The second part of Jin Luji's "Going to Luo": "What is sorrow and desire, lingering and confusing." The idioms "no city in the chest" and "no big ambition in the chest" also use this meaning. " Hawk" is the same as " chest", which means a part of the torso. "Vocabulary ‧ meat department": "Chest and the same chest." "Twenty years of public Zuo Xi ‧": "Wei Chou, Chest injury to the (chest), public Yusha, and love their material" ", Chest" The front can also be expressed in the literature. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng"Nandu Fu": "After Tang Guyong, Luoshui swayed his belly (chest)." Liu Liang's note: "The belly is the front."

胸字的基本解释

胸
xiōng
身体前面颈下腹上的部分，借指心里：胸脯。胸膛。胸腔。胸口。胸骨。胸椎。胸膜。胸怀（抱负、气量）。胸襟（同“胸怀”）。胸无点墨（指读书太少，文化水平极低）。直抒胸臆。胸中有数（sh?）。

胸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiōng］
亦作“胷1”。
(1)躯干的一部分，在颈和腹之间。
(2)心中；胸怀。
(3)喻指前面。
(4)喻指内部。

胸字的英文翻译

◎ 胸
chest, bosom, thorax, mind

胸字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页981第05
【正字通】同胷。

胸字的源字形

胸字的起名意思

人和动物躯干的一部分，在头颈和腹部之间;指心里（跟气量、见识等有关）。

chest
Basic explanation of words
chest
xiōng
The part of the body in front of the neck, lower abdomen, borrowed from the heart: chest. chest. Chest cavity. Chest. sternum. thoracic. pleura. Mind (ambition, temperament). Mind (same as "mind"). Poor-minded (referring to too little reading and very low level of education). Express your conscience. There is a number in the chest (sh?).
chest
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiōng］
Also known as "胷1".
(1) A part of the trunk, between the neck and abdomen.
(2) Heart; mind.
(3) The metaphor refers to the front.
(4) The metaphor refers to the interior.

chest
Source glyph
chest
Name meaning
The part of the human and animal torso, between the head, neck and abdomen; refers to the heart (related to breath, insight, etc.).
会意字。从月(肉),其形像块肉,表示胸是肉体一部分;从匈,匈是胸的本字;匈(xiong )亦声。本义是胸部。
①躯干的一部分,在颈和腹之间:~膛|~腔|祖~露
臂。2内心:~怀|~襟|~中有数。
~部 ~次 ~骨 ~口 ~膜~脯 ~像 ~臆
~章 ~无点墨 ~有成竹 气~ 心~ 成竹在~

隶)
楷
南月
Зная слово.
Congyue (мясо), его форма похожа на кусок мяса, что означает, что грудка является частью плоти; с венгерского языка венгерский - оригинальное слово для обозначения груди; также звучит венгерский (xiong).
Первоначальное значение - сундук.
① Часть туловища между шеей и животом: ~ Отверстие | Открытые руки.
2 Внутреннее сердце: ~ Хуай | ~ Ли | ~ В нем есть счет.
~ Часть ~ Времена ~ Кость ~ Мембрана ~ Сохранилась ~ Как ~ Ян ~ Глава ~ Нет чернил ~ Чэн Чжу Ци ~ Сердце ~ Чэн Чжу в ~
грудь
грудь
писец)
Кай
Nanyue
xiōng
I сущ.
1) грудь
水淹到胸际 вода по грудь (доходит до груди)
把奖章佩在胸前 надеть на грудь знаки отличия
胸中热 жжёт жар, воспаление в груди
胸背 грудь и спина
2) перен. грудь, душа, сердце, дух; чувства; мысли; ум; стремления
胸中正, 则眸子了焉, 胸中不正, 则眸子眊焉 когда в душе ты правдив, ясны тогда и зрачки; когда же в душе ты неправ, тогда тускнеют и зрачки твои
3) перен. перёд, лицевая сторона
汤谷滴其后, 淯水荡其胸 позади неё (Южной столицы) клокочет Тангу-река, а спереди её омывает река Юйшуй
II словообр.
в медицине и анатомии: грудная клетка (полость) (соответствует латинским корням thorax, pectus)
气胸 пневмоторакс
胸联胎 торакопаги
鸡胸 куриная грудь
Radicals: 月, 勹, 凶  (moon, prison, treasure-chest)
Meaning Mnemonic
In a prison on the moon lies a treasure chest containing a golden chest piece. This mighty chest armor will grant you protection from nearly any attack, for it is imbued with moon magic.
Imagine finding this treasure chest and donning the mighty chest armor. Feel the weight of the golden chest piece and the vast protection it grants you.
Reading Mnemonic
Where is this chest armor from? It’s from the moon. Now how would you say that if you were Canadian? It’s from the moon, eh (むね). Right, this here chest armor is from the moon, eh.
Try and remember this kanji and its reading and meaning with a Canadian accent and you’ll have no problem remembering how to read it, eh.
